lead: Do not miss the mega sale at the FC Shakhtar online shop. This is the only time of year, when the discounts on the items get enormously big.
text1: The most attractive price offers will be available at shop.shakhtar.com. Register right now and be the first to receive the information about the Black Friday 2016.
text2: The first 100 registered participants will receive a gift cup from FC Shakhtar!*
addText: * If they purchase UAH 500 worth of items at the online store during November 25-27
